name: Doggos Dungeon
description:
You wake up in a dungeon. You’re alone and all your dogs disappeared !!

You have to go through this dangerous dungeon, to take back your power given by your dogs. Oh! And you’re a wizard!

This  game was made by 5 students for the "Ludum Dare" game jam october 2019

Game Design & Programmation by

- Cyprien Ravidat

- Florian Launay

- Lisa Fontaine

Concept Art & Game Art by

- Eva Soulat

- Lucas Ambs

Hope you enjoy it !
